item.title: Firefly case study
item.description: Firefly Case Study 1. Introduction Serverless functions have become a key part of distributed architectures. Unfortunately, due to their stateless, ephemeral nature they are difficult to observe with standard observability approaches. They can behave like a black box in your system. Firefly is an open-source observability framework for serverless functions. It provides key insights into serverless function health through the use of metrics and traces–illuminating the black box..
